errors.error_description: Installing dependencies globally before setting up virtual environment, which can cause conflicts
correction_candidates: Remove the pip install command from step 2 and install dependencies after activating the virtual environment
Use pip3 instead of pip for the dependency installation command
Add --user flag to the pip install command to install dependencies locally
Install dependencies using conda instead of pip
errors.golden_answer: Remove the pip install command from step 2 and install dependencies after activating the virtual environment
